Uses of Class
edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc.Algorithm

  • Packages that use Algorithm 
    Package Description
    edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc
    This package implements a signal processing framework.

    • Uses of Algorithm in edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc

      Subclasses of Algorithm in edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Butterworth
      A Butterworth filter algorithm.
      class  EdgeDetect
      The EdgeDetect algorithm outputs a one when a positive edge is detected and a negative one when a negative edge is detected.
      class  GyroDetect
      This algorithm detects gyro movement.
      class  HighPassFilter
      A simple high-pass filter algorithm.
      class  MovingAverage
      This algorithm is a low-pass filter using the rolling window method.
      class  Power
      Calculates an approximate value for the average power measured over time of the incoming signal.
      class  PulseCount
      This algorithm counts the number of pulses (ones) that occur within the given time threshold and outputs a one if the number threshold has been exceeded.
      class  Threshold
      This algorithm detects when the input signal exceeds a threshold point and outputs a one when the threshold is exceeded.
      Methods in edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc that return Algorithm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Algorithm Pipeline.getAlgorithm(int index)
      Accessor for an algorithm within the pipeline.
      Methods in edu.lafayette.bci.sigproc with parameters of type Algorithm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Pipeline.addAlgorithm(Algorithm a)
      Adds an algorithm to the end of the pipeline
